Developer Terms of Use
des: diginomica is a media/analyst property designed to serve the interests of enterprise leaders in the digital era. Our mission is to push beyond the tech hype and examine the realities of transformation efforts. Launched in 2013, we have a team of writers and analysts based in the US and Europe who share decades of experience in enterprise software analysis.
